project.caption: WINC1500 Connecting a TLS Enterprise Secured AP Example for SAM4S XPlained Pro
project.info: This example demonstrates how to connect WINC1500 Wi-Fi module to a 802.1x enterprise secured network which uses TLS as phase2 authentication. The supported enterprise methods by this example are EAP with TLS (Extensible Authentication Protocol - Transport Layer Security) PEAPv0 with TLS (Protected Extensible Authentication Protocol v0 - Transport Layer Security) PEAPv1 with TLS (Protected Extensible Authentication Protocol v1 - Transport Layer Security)
